Trade/Device Name(s): NOVA View Automated Fluorescence Microscope with AUTOLoader
Regulation Name(s): Automated indirect immunofluorescence microscope and software-assisted system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for NOVA View Automated Fluorescence Microscope with optional AUTOLoader hardware accessory for automated slide handling and digital imaging in antibody detection assays.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended as an aid in the detection and classification of certain antibodies by indirect immunofluorescence technology; used only with cleared or approved in vitro diagnostic assays with operator confirmation of results.
